import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import { set } from 'mongoose'; const Register = () => { const [formData, setFromData] = useState({ name : '', email : '', password : '', password2 : '' }); const { name, email, password, password2} = formData; const onChange = e => setFromData({ ...FormData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); return (
